name: FakeblOx
description:
Yo, credits to David Baszucki for making the real version. This is just fanmade.

Welcome to FakeblOx, the nonexistant platform.

Just remember, you can buy anything just if you buy Fakebux, your balance is infinite! :)

Sign up today and enjoy the authentic FakeblOx experience!

We have games, a wide variety of shop items, a simplistic editor, and more!

Want to go further then the regular user? Sign up for Sculptures Union!*

Benefits include more Fakebux, special items, and more!

Client Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

Mouse/Number Keys to use items

Space Key to Jump

Editor Controls:

Mouse to place and drag pieces.

W/S to resize pieces

A/D to rotate pieces

Z to delete pieces

*All mentions of premium upgrades are with fake money.
